name: Oathbound

skills.name: Shatter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK] [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Subjugate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 30%. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Intimidate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks at random 4 times. Each attack has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
